Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscd212lib.lab4.Display

extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper lib (class) for when you have question about the display

        public boolean isInOptionsButtonRight​(int displayX,

        Parameters:

        displayY - the display y (often the mouse y)
